item.title: Financial Independence Course
item.description: If youâ€™ve been following us for a while, you know we are super passionate about FIRE/financial independence. Five years ago, we didn’t even know where our money was going. Our dream of moving abroad felt so far away: we didn’t have any money. But we knew we had to do something about it! We made a promise: that we would never have problems with money anymore. We started budgeting, investing, and growing our net worth.

item.title: 12xstartup
item.description: Hey, Stefanni here! ðŸ‘‹ I am happy to share that I’ve joined the 12xstartup.com challenge! Starting November 1st, and I wanted to share a few things with you: Goal My main goal is to work consistently, get feedback, and learn how to solve problems. I may not get to do 12 projects, but I will try my best. Maybe focusing on one project for 2 months or so, I don’t know yet.
